channel.title: Bases on I, Oliver Bonham-Carter, In June
channel.description: Recent content in Bases on I, Oliver Bonham-Carter, In June

item.title: Class Activity 01 Solutions
item.description:
Articles

  • Dataset 1: This Solar Eclipse Forecast from 2017 Shows What We Still Don’t Know About the Sun

  • Dataset 2: Trump finally orders flags lowered to honor McCain

  • Dataset 3: Watch ‘The Bee Man’ flush hundreds of hornets from their nest — in an old El Camino

  • Dataset 4: Can we recreate dinosaurs from their DNA?

  • Dataset 5: Hawaii Takes A New Spot In U.S. Rainfall Records, After Hurricane Lane Drenches State

item.title: Class Activity 01
item.description:
